mapper.select: SELECT B.board_no , B.board_title , B.board_content , B.board_hits , B.m_id , M.m_nickname , B.board_date , B.board_modi_date , COUNT(C.comment_no) AS commentCount FROM board AS B INNER JOIN member AS M ON B.m_id = M.m_id LEFT JOIN comment AS C ON B.board_no = C.board_no GROUP BY B.board_no LIMIT #{column}, 10

SELECT B.board_no , B.board_title , B.board_content , B.board_hits , B.m_id , B.board_date , B.board_modi_date , M.m_nickname , SQ.comment_no , SQ.comment_sort , SQ.comment_depth , SQ.comment_content , SQ.m_id AS cMId , SQ.m_nickname AS cMNickname , SQ.comment_date , SQ.comment_modi_date FROM board AS B LEFT JOIN member AS M ON B.m_id = M.m_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.comment_no , C.board_no , C.comment_sort , C.comment_depth , C.comment_content , C.m_id , CM.m_nickname , C.comment_date , C.comment_modi_date FROM comment AS C INNER JOIN member AS CM ON CM.m_id = C.m_id ) AS SQ ON SQ.board_no = B.board_no WHERE B.board_no = #{no} ORDER BY SQ.comment_sort, SQ.comment_depth, IF(ISNULL(SQ.comment_modi_date), SQ.comment_date, SQ.comment_modi_date)
mapper.insert: UPDATE board SET board_hits = board_hits+1 WHERE board_no=#{no}

INSERT INTO board ( board_no , board_title , board_content , m_id , board_date) VALUES ( (SELECT B.board_no FROM board AS B ORDER BY B.board_no DESC LIMIT 1 )+1 , #{boardTitle} , #{boardContent} , #{mId} , NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_content=#{boardContent} , board_modi_date=NOW() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( comment_no , board_no , comment_sort , comment_depth , comment_content , m_id , comment_date) VALUES ( (SELECT C.comment_no FROM comment AS C ORDER BY C.comment_no DESC LIMIT 1 )+1 , #{boardNo} , (SELECT D.comment_sort FROM comment AS D WHERE D.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY D.comment_sort DESC LIMIT 1 )+1 , #{commentDepth} , #{commentContent} , #{mId} , NOW() );

INSERT INTO comment ( comment_no , board_no , comment_sort , comment_depth , comment_content , m_id , comment_date) VALUES ( (SELECT C.comment_no FROM comment AS C ORDER BY C.comment_no DESC LIMIT 1 )+1 , #{boardNo} , #{commentSort} , #{commentDepth} , #{commentContent} , #{mId} , NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT B.board_no , B.board_title , B.board_content , B.board_hits , B.m_id , M.m_nickname , B.board_date , B.board_modi_date FROM bookmark AS BM INNER JOIN board AS B INNER JOIN member AS M ON B.board_no = BM.board_no AND B.m_id = M.m_id WHERE BM.m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY BM.bookmark_no DESC LIMIT #{column}, 10
